content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Hassan. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am confident that we can come to an agreement on a rental price that is fair for both of us. May I ask what budget you have in mind for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 500 Euros per month. Can you tell me the rental price you are thinking of?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I appreciate your interest in the apartment, Hassan. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am confident that we can come to an agreement on a rental price that is fair for both of us. May I ask what budget you have in mind for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have a budget of 500 Euros per month. Can you tell me the rental price you are thinking of?

I agree to the price of 450 Euros per month.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia
